author: JamesWTruher
body: A very large number of tests were being skipped (+3100) on non-Windows platform. PSDefaultParameterValues was not being changed in the global scope.

comments.author: adityapatwardhan
comments.body: @JamesWTruher Can you add a commit with [Feature] so it executes all the tests?

title: Be sure to change psdefaultparametervalue in the global scope
